card.name: Brave the Elements
card.text: Choose a color. White creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Clever Impersonator
card.text: You may have Clever Impersonator enter the battlefield as a copy of any nonland permanent on the battlefield.

card.name: Courser of Kruphix
card.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed.You may play lands from the top of your library.Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Dispel
card.text: Counter target instant spell.

card.name: Eerie Interlude
card.text: Exile any number of target creatures you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Eidolon of the Great Revel
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell with mana value 3 or less, Eidolon of the Great Revel deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Eldrazi Displacer
card.text: Devoid (This card has no color.){2}{C}: Exile another target creature, then return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

card.name: Ethereal Armor
card.text: Enchant creatureEnchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control and has first strike.

card.name: Fiery Impulse
card.text: Fiery Impulse deals 2 damage to target creature.Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Fiery Impulse deals 3 damage instead.

card.name: Kozilek, the Great Distortion
card.text: When you cast this spell, if you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.MenaceDiscard a card with mana value X: Counter target spell with mana value X.

card.name: Mana Confluence
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Matter Reshaper
card.text: ({C} represents colorless mana.)When Matter Reshaper dies, reveal the top card of your library. You may put that card onto the battlefield if it's a permanent card with mana value 3 or less. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

card.name: Mutavault
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{2}, {T}: Choose a color. Add an amount of mana of that color equal to your devotion to that color. (Your devotion to a color is the number of mana symbols of that color in the mana costs of permanents you control.)

card.name: Nylea's Presence
card.text: Enchant landWhen Nylea's Presence enters the battlefield, draw a card.Enchanted land is every basic land type in addition to its other types.

card.name: Reflector Mage
card.text: When Reflector Mage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand. That creature's owner can't cast spells with the same name as that creature until your next turn.

card.name: Rending Volley
card.text: This spell can't be countered.Rending Volley deals 4 damage to target white or blue creature.

card.name: Satyr Wayfinder
card.text: When Satyr Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Shaman of the Pack
card.text: When Shaman of the Pack enters the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to the number of Elves you control.

card.name: Sliver Hivelord
card.text: Sliver creatures you control have indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

card.name: Soldier of the Pantheon
card.text: Protection from multicoloredWhenever an opponent casts a multicolored spell, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Thought-Knot Seer
card.text: ({C} represents colorless mana.)When Thought-Knot Seer enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.When Thought-Knot Seer leaves the battlefield, target opponent draws a card.

card.name: Wastes
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: World Breaker
card.text: Devoid (This card has no color.)When you cast this spell, exile target artifact, enchantment, or land.Reach{2}{C}, Sacrifice a land: Return World Breaker from your graveyard to your hand. ({C} represents colorless mana.)

card.name: Zulaport Cutthroat
card.text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
